Description: - Various adjustments to orb spawning behavior (a bit less horizontal motion and some more variance and details to its motion)
- New categories added to builds are now wider by default
- Added a console command: deadlock_get_old_builds, which will download and print out all of the build data for your account prior to the new builds feature
- Added a directional arrow particle effect to {{Icon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball for {{Icon|Viscous}} Viscous
- Added additional particles while using {{Icon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball
- Fixed hit detection on {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch and {{Icon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball
- Fixed {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch having 2x the range of the tooltip.
- Fixed {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch being able to target behind puddle
- Fixed {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch using Guardians as a surface to punch from
- {{Icon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch Range reduced from 70m to 60m
- {{Icon|Splatter}} Splatter now deals less damage if it hits the same target multiple times. 66% damage for the second hit, 33% damage for the third hit.
